citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am on
19OCT2022.
Called and left message, waited 1/2 hour. Mrs. Curtis returned my call and left a message. She is out of town today and
won't return until next week. She is moving and submitted a change of address request. Will inspect new site when the
request comes through.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am on 
19OCT2022. 
 
Called and left message, waited 1/2 hour.  Mrs. Curtis returned my call and left a message.  She is out of town today and 
won't return until next week.  She is moving and submitted a change of address request.  Will inspect new site when the 
request comes through. 
 
 
 
End Section
